title: Beautiful 1 Bed Stunning Features 5 min Cherry Creek City Park
neighborhood: Hilltop * North Cherry Creek * Hale * Glendale * City Park
posting_body: Styled interiors with crisp lines, clean looks and the latest finishes.
From modern urban-inspired flats to relaxed courtyard townhomes.
* Resident Clubhouse with Catering Kitchen, TVs and Complimentary Coffee Station
* TV Lounge Complete with Indoor/Outdoor Seating Options
* Private Library Retreat
* Executive Conference Room
* Resort Style Pool with Cabanas and Day Loungers
* Spa Terrace Surrounded by Lush Landscaping
* Poolside Lounge with Gaming and Multi-Media Connectivity
* Outdoor Entertaining Courtyard Complete with Gourmet Grills and Fireside Communal Dining
* Serene Courtyard Featuring Soothing Garden Oasis of Outdoor Water Fountains
* Outdoor Dog Run for Fido
* Two Level 24 Hour State of the Art Fitness Center featuring Cybex Cardio & Hoist Training Equipment, TRX, and Personal Yoga Studio Complete with Ballet Barre and Stretching Area
* Secured Parking with Electric Vehicle Charging Stations and Bike Storage
* VoIP
Intercom at Building Entry
* Wifi throughout Amenity Areas
Utilities and parking are not included.
Must be able to show 3x the monthly rent and have good standing credit, rental, and criminal history.
Call or Text Patrick to set up your Virtual or In Person showing
*Restrictions Apply.
Pricing, availability and lease terms subject to change anytime!
